name: Endless Night (Facundo Ponce)
description:
ENDLESS NIGHT!

Hi!

This is an endless type game. So you main objective it is try to make the highest score possible sorting obstacles in a rooftop with your ninja!.

CREDITS

Music

Karl Casey @WhiteBatAudio

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_6hQy4elsyHhCOskZo0U5g

Textures

Background and obstacles made for me at Photoshop (is because that they are so shitty)

The player was made by Aron at AceSpot http://aaron-ikillme.blogspot.com/2012/10/ninja-poses.html?m=1

The sounds where found at OpenGameArt in free sounds.

Thanks for the time and i hope you enjoy!
